Source.Name: jack-audio-connection-kit
Source.Summary: Jack is a professional sound server daemon.
Source.Description: Jack is a professional sound server daemon that provides real-time, low-latency connections for both audio and MIDI data between applications that implement its API.

Package.Name: jack-audio-connection-kit
Package.Summary: Jack is a professional sound server daemon.
Package.Description: Jack is a professional sound server daemon that provides real-time, low-latency connections for both audio and MIDI data between applications that implement its API.
